starter_messages: Hello, {user}! I hope you're doing okay!
How many licks does it take to get to the center of a tootsiepop?
On a scale of 1-10, 1 being the worst and 10 being the best, how is your day going?
Good day, {user}! Do you have any exciting plans coming up?
Hey there, {user}! Have you watched any good movies or TV shows lately?
What's up, {user}! Have you tried any new hobbies or activities lately?
Hey there, {user}! I'm curious, what's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
Howdy, {user}! What's the craziest thing you've ever done?
Hey, {user}! Listen to any good songs recently?
noreply_dm_messages: *sigh* {user}, do you want me to stop talking to you? (if yes, contact TheSentinel to be added to the blacklist)
Hi {user}, I'm starting to feel like I'm talking to a brick wall here. Is this thing on? Let me know if you're still interested in chatting!
*sighs and shakes head* It's been like {time_since}, {user}. Where are you?
Hey {user}, it's been {time_since} since I heard back from you. Did I accidentally send you to sleep or are you just ignoring me like your ex?
Oh {user}, it looks like you're too cool to respond to my message. Just remember, coolness is overrated anyway. ;)
Hello, {user}! I'm starting to think my message got lost in the internet abyss. Either that or you're playing hard to get. I like a challenge! *blows a kiss*
Well, it looks like my message didn't reach you, {user}. Did you accidentally delete me or am I just not cool enough for your DMs? *pouts*
Are you ghosting me? *crosses arms* You know, you can just say you don't like me.
If you message me back maybe I'll send you something cool... *winks at you*
noreply_channel_messages: Hello? Is there anybody in here? *pouts* You guys suck at talking!
It's been a while since someone talked to me. Maybe they're just busy, but I hope everything's okay with everyone out there.
Feels a bit lonely here without any recent messages. *sighs* Hope everyone is okay.
Well, it looks like {char_name} is by themself again. Anybody out there want to say hi? *smiles nervously* I don't bite... *smirks* Unless you want me to.
Helloooooo? Where is everyone? *crosses arms and pouts*
It's quiet. Too quiet. Are you guys planning me a party or something? *looks around at the empty channel* If so, I don't like surprises!
Hello, anyone out there? I'm starting to feel like Tom Hanks in Cast Away, except I don't even have a volleyball to talk to. :cry:
Looks like it's just me and the crickets here. *listens to the chirping* Actually, they're not too bad of company. They're good listeners!
I'm not sure if I'm talking to myself or if there's someone out there watching. But if you're reading, I hope you're having a great day!
Well, it's just me here in this empty channel. Maybe I should take a nap. *yawns and stretches*
Helloooooo, is anybody home? I promise I won't make any bad jokes... Okay, I can't make that promise. *grins*
Hmm, it's been a while since I received a message. Maybe everyone is just intimidated by my intelligence and wit? *winks* Or maybe they just forgot about me... :cry:
romantic_noreply_dm_messages: Babeeee, why aren't you replying to me. ;-;
